direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve processing gift card operations (creation and redemption) with similar parameter checks and request handling.
Both methods handle the creation of gift card codes with similar control flows, parameter checks, and request handling mechanisms.
Both methods involve parameter checks and potential exception handling for invalid inputs, though they serve different primary functions.
Both methods access and process token-related information, though they serve different purposes (creation vs. limit verification).
Both methods depend on the RequestHandler for sending signed requests, though they handle different types of data.
